src:
Laga Kontra PSM Ditunda, Persebaya Merasa Sedikit Diuntungkan
01 Nov 2019, 19:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Laga Persebaya Surabaya kontra PSM Makassar pada pekan ke-26 Shopee Liga 1 2019 sudah pasti ditunda. Menyusul belum adanya kepastian dari PT. Liga Indonesia maupun PSSI mengenai status pertandingan.
Atas penundaan tersebut, Persebaya merasa sedikit diuntungkan karena bisa punya persiapan lebih menatap laga berikutnya. Meskipun, sampai saat ini belum ada kejelasan mengenai pertandingan itu.
"Jujur dengan ditundanya laga ini saya sedikit diuntungkan, artinya saya ada waktu persiapan yang sedikit lama untuk menghadapi pertandingan tanggal 9 (November)," kata Aji Santoso, Jumat (1/10/2019).
Pada tanggal 9 November, Persebaya akan menghadapi Tira Persikabo. Pertandingan tersebut akan dihelat di Stadion Pakansari, Cibinong.
"Ini ditunda dan tidak tau mainnya kapan, tapi dari segi teknis kami sedikit diuntungkan, karena ada persiapan lebih," imbuh mantan arsitek Persela Lamongan tersebut.
Laga Persebaya kontra PSM Makassar sedianya digelar di Stadion Batakan, Balikpapan, Sabtu (2/11/2019) besok. Namun, belakangan PSM keberatan sehingga laga itu dikembalikan ke federasi dan operator liga.

Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters.
text:
PSM Counter Match Postponed, Persebaya Feeling a Little Favorable
Nov 01 2019, 19:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persebaya Surabaya match against Makassar PSM in the 26th week of Shopee Liga 1 2019 is definitely postponed. Following the uncertainty of PT. Indonesian League and PSSI regarding the status of the match.
For the postponement, Persebaya felt slightly benefited because they could have more preparation to stare at the next fight. Although, until now there has been no clarity about the match.
"Honestly with the postponement of this match, I benefited a little, which means I have a little time to prepare for the match on 9 (November)," said Aji Santoso, Friday (01/10/2019).
On November 9, Persebaya will face Tira Persikabo. The match will be held at the Pakansari Stadium, Cibinong.
"This is postponed and we do not know when, but from a technical point of view we have benefited a little, because there is more preparation," added the former architect of Persela Lamongan.
Persebaya match counter PSM Makassar was originally held at the Batakan Stadium, Balikpapan, Saturday (11/02/2019) tomorrow. However, PSM later objected so that the game was returned to the federation and league operators.

Scroll down for more information, Bolaneters.
